articles.content: The popularity of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan has tumbled in Britain and has never been lower following their explosive interview with U.S. chat show host Oprah Winfrey, according to a poll on F… [+1981 chars]

articles.author: Rebecca Davison
articles.title: Dancing On Ice: Ben Shephard says Faye Brooks 'broke' pro skating partner Hamish Gaman - Daily Mail
articles.description: Dancing On Ice's Faye Brookes was left lost for words on Good Morning Britain on Friday when host Ben Shephard said she had 'broken' pro skater Hamish Gaman.
articles.content:

Graham Bell's partner Yebin Mok suffers a freak accident after suffering 'a very nasty wound from an ice blade'.
